# The `PhiValues` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Class for calculating and caching the underlying values of phis in a function.

Initially the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivalues">PhiValues</a> is empty, and gets incrementally populated whenever it is queried.

Definition at line 40 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/phivalues-h">PhiValues.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### getValuesForPhi() {#a5b49f5e79199f2d8e4eac36021fa7ca9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const PhiValues::ValueSet &amp; PhiValues::getValuesForPhi (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42; PN)</>}>
Get the underlying values of a phi.

This returns the cached value if PN has previously been processed, otherwise it processes it first.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/phivalues-h/#l00051">51</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/phivalues-h">PhiValues.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/phivalues-cpp/#l00125">125</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/phivalues-cpp">PhiValues.cpp</a>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/phivalues-h/#l00068">68</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/phivalues-h">PhiValues.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/phivalues-cpp/#l00026">26</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/phivalues-cpp">PhiValues.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### invalidateValue() {#a1f338cd311db969863e0560bed619bf5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void PhiValues::invalidateValue (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; V)</>}>
Notify <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivalues">PhiValues</a> that the cached information using V is no longer valid.

Whenever a phi has its operands modified the cached values for that phi (and the phis that use that phi) become invalid. A user of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivalues">PhiValues</a> has to notify it of this by calling invalidateValue on either the operand or the phi, which will then clear the relevant cached information.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/phivalues-h/#l00059">59</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/phivalues-h">PhiValues.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/phivalues-cpp/#l00137">137</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/phivalues-cpp">PhiValues.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Depth numbers of phis.

Phis with the same depth number are part of the same strongly connected component.
